BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Items.Title: Resolution pursuant to the State Open Meetings Law providing that the Council and its Committees and Subcommittees may use videoconferencing to conduct meetings in accordance with the State Open Meetings Law and that the Speaker shall take all actions necessary to accomplish this and make any and all determinations during a disaster emergency relating to the in-person participation requirements of such law.
Items.MatterName: State Open Meetings Law providing that the Council and its Committees and Subcommittees may use videoconferencing to conduct meetings in accordance with the State Open Meetings Law.
